item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Welcome to the web page of Elizabeth Chin! I am currently a Computational Biologist Research Associate with the USDA in the lab of Danielle Lemay, where I am applying artificial intelligence methods human nutrition research. You can read more about me here. Please check out my CV page for more details about my skills and research experience. Iâ€™ve authored and co-authored several peer-reviewed research papers which have appeared in the journals Nutrition, Journal of Agricultural and Food Chemistry, Phytopathology, and The Journal of Nutrition.
